mapper.select: SELECT N.RNUM RNUM, N.NO, N.NAME, N.TITLE, N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, N.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, N.CODE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.NO, M.NAME , M.TITLE , M.START_DATE, M.END_DATE, M.SCHEDULE_FLAG , M.CREATED_DATE, M.CODE FROM( SELECT N.NO, NC.NAME, N.TITLE, N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, NC.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, NC.CODE FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY_CODE = NC.CODE ORDER BY NO DESC ) M ) N WHERE RNUM <= 5

SELECT N.RNUM RNUM, N.NO, N.NAME, N.TITLE, N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, N.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, N.CODE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.NO, M.NAME , M.TITLE , M.START_DATE, M.END_DATE, M.SCHEDULE_FLAG , M.CREATED_DATE, M.CODE FROM( SELECT N.NO, NC.NAME, N.TITLE, N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, NC.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, NC.CODE FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY_CODE = NC.CODE
ORDER BY NO DESC ) M ) N WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT N.RNUM RNUM, N.NO, N.NAME, N.TITLE, N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, N.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, N.CODE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.NO, M.NAME , M.TITLE , M.START_DATE, M.END_DATE, M.SCHEDULE_FLAG , M.CREATED_DATE, M.CODE FROM( SELECT N.NO, NC.NAME, N.TITLE, N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, NC.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, NC.CODE FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY_CODE = NC.CODE
ORDER BY NO DESC ) M ) N WHERE RNUM = ${rnum} - 1

SELECT N.RNUM RNUM, N.NO, N.NAME, N.TITLE, N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, N.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, N.CODE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.NO, M.NAME , M.TITLE , M.START_DATE, M.END_DATE, M.SCHEDULE_FLAG , M.CREATED_DATE, M.CODE FROM( SELECT N.NO, NC.NAME, N.TITLE, N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, NC.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, NC.CODE FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY_CODE = NC.CODE
ORDER BY NO DESC ) M ) N WHERE RNUM = ${rnum} + 1
SELECT N.NO , NC.NAME , N.TITLE , N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, NC.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, NC.CODE FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY_CODE = NC.CODE WHERE NC.CODE = 0
SELECT N.NO , NC.NAME , N.TITLE , N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, NC.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, NC.CODE FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY_CODE = NC.CODE WHERE NC.CODE = 2
SELECT N.NO , NC.NAME , N.TITLE , N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, NC.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, NC.CODE FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY_CODE = NC.CODE WHERE NC.CODE = 1
SELECT N.NO , NC.NAME , N.TITLE , N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, NC.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, NC.CODE, N.CONTENT FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY_CODE = NC.CODE WHERE N.NO = #{NO}

SELECT FLOOR((RNUM-1) / 10)+1 NO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.NO, M.NAME , M.TITLE , M.START_DATE, M.END_DATE, M.SCHEDULE_FLAG , M.CREATED_DATE, M.CODE FROM ( SELECT N.NO, NC.NAME , N.TITLE , N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, NC.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, NC.CODE FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY_CODE = NC.CODE
ORDER BY NO DESC ) M ) WHERE NO = #{no}
